derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English tēam 'team of draught animals', of Germanic origin; related to German Zaum 'bridle', also to teem and tow, from an Indo-European root shared by Latin ducere 'to lead'

encyclopedia.content: 英文意思指"团队"，中文意指为更加快捷的达成一个特定的目标，一些人所组成的群体。

entry.def: A team is a group of people who play a particular sport or game together against other similar groups of people.

example.ex: The team failed to qualify for the African Nations Cup finals...
example.tran: 该队未能闯入非洲国家杯决赛。

example.ex: He had lost his place in the England team.
example.tran: 他失去了在英格兰队的位置。

entry.def: You can refer to any group of people who work together as a team .

example.ex: Each specialist consultant has a team of doctors under him...
example.tran: 每位会诊专家手下都有一组医生。

example.ex: The governors were joined by Mr Hunter and his management team.
example.tran: 亨特先生及他率领的管理小组加入了州长们的队伍。

means.word_mean: 2. two or more draft animals that work together to pull something

sentences.sentence: "We teamed up for this new project"
